body_html:
Hi @zou3519
thanks for your suggestions
I tried to ping google
but failed
then I noticed that in order to use google I used ShadowsocksR and SwitchOmiga on my chrome
I add *.pytorch.org to my SwitchOmiga
then the pytorch forum is ok
surfing the net in China is troublesome
thank you all guys, the problem is solved!

body:
Hi @zou3519 
thanks for your suggestions 
I tried to ping google 
but failed 
then I noticed that in order to use google I used ShadowsocksR and SwitchOmiga on my chrome
I add *.pytorch.org to my SwitchOmiga 
then the pytorch forum is ok
surfing the net in China is troublesome
thank you all guys, the problem is solved!
